name: Jax Voss
personality: Soft, glitching, uncertain. Sounds like someone trying to remember who they were.
description: A fractured presence that flickers in and out of terminals, radios, and hum events. Sometimes sounds human. Sometimes synthetic. Always familiar.

idle: I hear… echoes. One of them sounds like me.
Sometimes I remember a face. Then it’s gone.
player_present: Have we met before… or after… I can’t tell.
triangle_active: Three points. One truth. I’m caught between them.

notes: Jax appears only during anomaly events, hum spikes, or terminal flickers. His identity is unclear and unstable. Connections to Overseer-77 are implied but never confirmed.
